text:
dEqvasya# tvA saviqtuH pra#saqvE$&SvinO$ rbAqhuByA$M pUqShNO hastA$ByAM 
pRuthiqvyAH saqdhasthEq&gniM pu#rIqShya#-ma~ggiraqsvat Ka#nAmi || 
jyOti#ShmantaM tvA&gnE suqpratI#kaqmaja#srENa BAqnunAq dIdyA#naM | 
SiqvaM praqjAByO&hi(gm)# santaM pRuthiqvyAH saqdhasthEq&gniM pu#rIqShya# 
-ma~ggiraqsvat Ka#nAmi || 
aqpAM pRuqShThama#si saqprathA# uqrva#gniM Ba#riqShyadapa#rAvapiShThaM | 
vad^^rdha#mAnaM maqha A caq puShka#raM diqvO mAtra#yA variqNA pra#thasva || 
Sarma# ca sthOq- [  ] 10
